assignment3_Jianchuan_Li

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment3_Jianchuan_Li.Library

  • public class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Library class enable users to display menu, add/change/remove customer,add/remove book, borrow book, display customers,books,and due date.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jianchuan Li
    See Also:
    ArrayList, Calendar, InputMismatchException, Scanner

      • launch

        public void launch()
        display global menu and perform user's choice
        See Also:
        executeMenuItem(int), displayMenu()

      • displayMenu

        private int displayMenu()
        display menu,the constants is used instead of 1,2,3,4
        Returns:
        an integer as user's choice
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - if user inputs anything except number

      • executeMenuItem

        private void executeMenuItem(int num)
        execute the menu as user's choice 1 for chnage customer,2 for change book,3 for loan books, 4 for display all customers with loan, 5 for display all customer with fine, 6 for display all checked books,7 for display all overdue loan, 0 for exit.
        Parameters:
        num - user's choice
        See Also:
        changeCustomer(), changeBook(), borrow(Customer customer, Book book, String date), BookLoan.getFine(), DataCreator.outputData(java.util.Collection)

      • changeCustomer

        private boolean changeCustomer()
        Display menu of changeCustomer, option include add customer,change address, and remove customer.Perform user's choice by call other methods following. If user input other character than number, display"Please input a number" and exit.
        Returns:
        boolean as the status
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - if user inputs anything except number

      • addCustomer

        private boolean addCustomer()
        add the customer if it is not customer of library now
        Returns:
        boolean as status(true for success, false for not success)
        See Also:
        Customer.equals(Customer)

        Returns:
        boolean as status(true for success, false for not success)

      • removeCustomer

        private boolean removeCustomer()
        remove the library customer if it didn't loan books
        Returns:
        boolean as status(true for success, false for not success)
        See Also:
        checkLoanBook(Customer), Customer.equals(Customer)

      • changeBook

        private boolean changeBook()
        display menu and perform user's choice return status
        Returns:
        user's choice
        Throws:
        java.util.InputMismatchException - if user inputs anything except number
        See Also:
        addBook(), removeBook()

        Returns:
        boolean as status(true for success, false for not success)

      • borrow

        public boolean borrow(Customer customer,
                      Book book,
                      java.lang.String date)
        create loan
        Parameters:
        customer - customer who would loan book
        book - book which would be loaned
        date - the loan date
        Returns:
        boolean as status(true for success, false for not success)
